methodology_zh:
## 数据来源

中华民国内政部户政司《人口统计资料》，民国113年度（2024年）各县市人口数按性别及五岁年龄组分。

数据来源网站：[内政部户政司全球资讯网](https://www.ris.gov.tw/app/portal/346)

## 数据说明

### 台湾人口统计方法

台湾采用**户籍登记制度**，人口数据来自：
- 户政事务所户籍登记
- 出生、死亡、迁徙等动态统计
- 定期人口普查校正

### 参数估计依据

1. **总和生育率(TFR)**：2024年约0.87（全球最低之一），预计持续下降
2. **预期寿命**：2024年约81岁，医疗水平先进
3. **平均生育年龄**：约32.5岁，晚婚晚育趋势明显
4. **出生性别比**：约1.07（略高于自然比例）

### 本模拟器计算思路

1. **队列组元法**：将5岁组人口均匀插值为单岁人口
2. **出生模拟**：育龄女性(15-49岁) × 年龄别生育率
3. **死亡模拟**：Gompertz死亡率模型，根据预期寿命校准
4. **动态参数**：支持TFR、预期寿命、平均生育年龄线性插值
methodology_en:
## Data Source

Population Statistics from Department of Household Registration, Ministry of the Interior, R.O.C. (Taiwan), Year 2024 (ROC Year 113) - Population by Sex and Five-Year Age Groups.

Data source: [Department of Household Registration Website](https://www.ris.gov.tw/app/portal/346)

## Data Description

### Taiwan Population Statistics Method

Taiwan uses a **Household Registration System**, with population data from:
- Household registration at local offices
- Vital statistics (births, deaths, migration)
- Periodic census corrections

### Parameter Estimation Basis

1. **Total Fertility Rate (TFR)**: ~0.87 in 2024 (among lowest globally), expected to continue declining
2. **Life Expectancy**: ~81 years in 2024, advanced healthcare system
3. **Mean Childbearing Age**: ~32.5 years, late marriage and childbearing trends
4. **Sex Ratio at Birth**: ~1.07 (slightly above natural ratio)

### Simulation Methodology

1. **Cohort-Component Method**: Interpolate 5-year age groups to single-year ages
2. **Birth Simulation**: Fertile females (15-49) × Age-specific fertility rate
3. **Death Simulation**: Gompertz mortality model calibrated to life expectancy
4. **Dynamic Parameters**: Linear interpolation for TFR, life expectancy, and mean childbearing age
